mapper.select: select t1.*,(t1.co*t1.goods_count)total from (select tog.goods_id, tg.name goodsName, count(tog.goods_id) co,tog.goods_count ,tod.shop_id from t_order_goods tog left join t_goods tg on tg.id = tog.goods_id left join t_order_detail tod on tog.order_detail_id = tod.id where tod.shop_id=#{shopId} group by tog.goods_id)t1 order by total desc limit 0,10; -- select t_goods.name from t_goods

select t1.*,(t1.co*t1.goods_count)total from (select tog.goods_id, tg.name goodsName, count(tog.goods_id) co,tog.goods_count ,tod.shop_id from t_order_goods tog left join t_goods tg on tg.id = tog.goods_id left join t_order_detail tod on tog.order_detail_id = tod.id where tod.shop_id=#{shopId} group by tog.goods_id)t1 order by total desc limit 0,10;
